attributes.action: Stop paying MPs that are found guilty of breaking the law and go to prison
attributes.background: Fiona Onasanya the MP for Peterborough and a former Labour whip, has been sentenced to a jail sentence for perverting the course of justice by lying to the police. She should not be paid and asked to step down from her MP position.

rejection.details:
We can't accept petitions about appointments, which includes calling for MPs to be sacked.

If you would like for MP’s to automatically lose their job if they are imprisoned, you may wish to sign this petition: 

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/236142
